title: Hooks: useState and useEffect
content:
Module 3, Lesson 4: Hooks: useState and useEffect

Introduction

This lesson covers Hooks: useState and useEffect, a core topic in React Component Architecture. Mastering this area will help you build reliable, scalable, and maintainable web applications.

Key Concepts

1. Fundamentals

Understanding the foundational principles of Hooks: useState and useEffect ensures you can apply them correctly in a variety of real-world scenarios. Always prefer clarity over cleverness.

2. Practical Application

Theory must translate into working code. In React Component Architecture, every concept has direct practical implications for how you architect, test, and deploy applications.

3. Common Pitfalls

Awareness of common mistakes in Hooks: useState and useEffect helps you avoid costly bugs and security vulnerabilities. Review real-world examples and practise defensive coding techniques.

4. Best Practices

Industry best practices evolve constantly. Keep up with community standards, read production post-mortems, and participate in code reviews to sharpen your skills in React Component Architecture.

Summary

You have completed Hooks: useState and useEffect in Module 3. Continue to the next lesson to build further expertise in React Component Architecture.
